title: I GOT HONOR 3!
body: I GOT HONOR 3! Out of nowhere it showed up. First person I know to have gotten it. https://www.twitch.tv/makerlive

replies.body: Thanks for confirming its possible.

> [{quoted}](name=Enloct,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ay8bLkvy,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-07-28T20:09:10.171+0000)
>
> Thanks for confirming it's possible.

FTFY

Edit: Haha, somehow pressed s instead of ' (now corrected)
it's, not itss (also not its for this case)

No, he's correct.  Enloct in the ancient and dead language of Mesmes means snake, therefore adding the extra S works since the guy named snake needs more SSSSSS.

Trust me, I'm on the internet, I have to be telling the truth.

Congrats!

What gamemode do you play mostly? Normals, ranked, ARAM, bots?
Solo or with team?
Ranked, played Draven and was very supportive popped after game lol, solo.

Congratulations! That's really impressive, considering that the first people in OCE just started getting Honor level 3 a couple days ago.

Great job!
Same I got it as well :)

WAIT WHAT?

As a support main who gets an honor a game (at least), I'm astonished this is actually possible.
IT'S NOT A MYTH!?
Congrats man!
I CAME TO THE BOARDS JUS TO SAY THIS , I also just levelled up , but the question is , whereis that capsule you get when you reach honor lvl 3 ? I didn't get it

> [{quoted}](name=Hikari Sakata,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ay8bLkvy,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-07-28T21:06:42.338+0000)
>
> I CAME TO THE BOARDS JUS TO SAY THIS , I also just levelled up , but the question is , whereis that capsule you get when you reach honor lvl 3 ? I didn't get it

you get the capsules at random
Yaaaay congrats! Looks like it's possible!
Congrats!
My friend git it at four in the morning before you.  I got it at lik 9 at night.
i got it too
I got it too

I'm more shocked that it took this long, especially if riot claims it's just going to last per season.. I saw GBay99 get his, and he's the nicest friendliest youtuber i watch.. 

means riot needs to tweak the system some more if they are going to reset it soon.
It's been like a month and a half...

I just got it and i've been playing on off within the last few weeks, it seems premade honors although not treated as normal random honor according to the Level 3 flair, still works pretty well at getting you there since im always playing with homies.
Anon9 as honor level 3. He's my brother. Also, congrats
Played 4 games everyday since its release and still no honor 3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I thought it was a Legend!
IS THIS REAL LIFE?
I got it yesterday! Nice job!
how is that even possible?
How does Honor lvl 3 even work? lmao and how do you get it

Yeah im rank 3 also . Honor sysmtem
Kinda weird
I also just got Honor three :D im not cool enough to have a screenshot but check my account Tecknoz!

http://imgur.com/a/vcu4j
I got one too alongside my friend Captnkrunchx today :)
I don't think you were the first ---------------------> https://www.reddit.com/r/sonamains/comments/6pq82e/i_got_honor_3_finallly/

It's definitely possible, I've got it too! :D
[](https://plus.google.com/u/0/photos/photo/112610245617164387935/6448048655376613010?icm=false)
Congrats! I also got Honour 3 JUST today and I'm really happy :D. I'm the only person I know to have gotten it thus far, I main support and it's very rewarding. My friend said it was a myth XD
Nice Bro!
congrats

I got mine last night, congrats!!

I get at least 1-2 honor most of my games personally, and on a somewhat regular basis am "most honorable on the team", if that helps indicate anything.

The Honor capsules are also given at random. I got my first one today, and it gave me 2 key shards (which opened a chest for Dunkmaster Darius!!)
